page.title: 14BISHAM ABBEY SPORTS CENTRE.
page.content: Bisham Sports Centre is situated in the grounds of Bisham Abbey, near the River Thames, to the south of Marlow. There are two parts to the Centre; the older buildings being used for conferences, and nearby is the new sports complex. Many national teams come to Bisham to train because of the superb facilities. When we visited the Centre in June, the national Weight Lifting team were training there. The Centre is also the base for a tennis school, which trains young players. Many people think that the Centre is haunted by the ghost of a Dame Elizabeth Hoby. There is a large painting of her in the Centre, and when it was taken down recently strange things started happening in the Centre. These strange events stopped as soon as the painting was replaced.
